hero.title: System Delivery Risk Analysis & Assessment Expert
hero.tagline: The only risk health check tool designed for system teams, helping you deliver with confidence
hero.subtitle: ForgeHelm is a risk assessment report service designed for system teams, helping you diagnose delivery risks, facilitate system handover, and evaluate the feasibility of modernization rewrites.

process.title: Four Simple Steps to Generate Professional Risk Assessment Reports

step1.title: Fill Out Assessment Questionnaire
step1.description: Structured questionnaire designed for system delivery scenarios, covering technical debt, documentation completeness, team maturity, and other dimensions

step2.title: AI Intelligent Analysis
step2.description: Automatically generate risk fingerprints and maturity quantitative scores, identify potential risk points and improvement suggestions

step3.title: Generate Professional Report
step3.description: Risk radar chart visualization, detailed analysis and improvement suggestions, PDF format available for direct download

step4.title: Multiple Application Scenarios
step4.description: Suitable for internal review meetings, system handover documents, rewrite assessment proposals, external presentations, or grant application evidence

about.title: About Us | Smart Sequence Tech
about.description: Smart Sequence Tech focuses on system analysis, document governance, and AI application technology services.
about.heroTagline: Making complexity clear, making systems more transferable
about.introText1: We are a technology service team focused on system analysis, document governance, and AI applications. We believe that complex systems should be clearly explained, risks should be quantified and visualized, and handovers should proceed more smoothly.
about.introText2: ForgeHelm is our first product, born from years of practical experience in system maintenance and handover. We are committed to developing practical, honest tools that truly help teams reduce risks.

about.founderDetail4: üí° Entrepreneurial motivation: Solve actual pain points in system handover and risk assessment

about.belief2: Professional assessments should have structured methods
about.belief3: Good tools should reduce communication costs
about.belief4: Technical services should be honest and practical

pricing.title: Pricing Plans | Smart Sequence Tech
pricing.description: Transparent and flexible service plans that meet different stage needs. All plans can issue legal invoices and comply with government procurement regulations.
pricing.heroSubtitle: Transparent and flexible service plans that meet different stage needs. All plans can issue legal invoices and comply with government procurement regulations.
pricing.planTrialNote: Suitable for users new to the service
pricing.planMonthlyNote: Suitable for teams conducting ongoing system assessments
pricing.planYearlyNote: Suitable for large enterprises or long-term partners
pricing.faqQ1: Q1: Can formal invoices be issued?
pricing.faqA1: Yes, Smart Sequence Tech is a formally registered business (Tax ID: 12345678). All paid plans can issue legal invoices (electronic invoices / cloud invoices), meeting government procurement and corporate accounting needs.
pricing.faqQ2: Q2: When will I receive the report after payment?
pricing.faqA2: After completing the questionnaire, the system will automatically generate the report. Generally, reports are generated within the same day, and you can download the PDF file immediately.
pricing.faqQ3: Q3: Will my data be uploaded to the cloud? How is data security guaranteed?
pricing.faqA3: Your questionnaire data will be securely stored on our servers using encrypted transmission and storage. We do not collect your customer system source code or sensitive data, only analyzing questionnaire answers. All data processing complies with Personal Data Protection Act regulations.
pricing.faqQ4: Q4: Can we accept enterprise monthly subscriptions or customized cooperation?
pricing.faqA4: Yes. If you have special needs (e.g., large volumes of reports, customized analysis dimensions, training, etc.), please contact us through the contact form or LINE, and we will provide a custom quote.
pricing.faqQ5: Q5: What's the difference between trial and paid plans?
pricing.faqA5: The trial plan allows you to experience the complete questionnaire process and preview partial report content, but you cannot download the complete PDF file. Paid plans allow you to download complete reports with permanent data storage.
pricing.faqQ6: Q6: Can I get a refund if I'm not satisfied?
pricing.faqA6: According to the Consumer Protection Act, we provide a 7-day return period. If you are not satisfied with the report quality, you can apply for a refund within 7 days of purchase (report generation costs will be deducted).
pricing.faqQ7: Q7: Can monthly plan report quantities be accumulated?
pricing.faqA7: Unused report quantities for the current month will not carry over to the next month. If you expect to generate more reports in a certain month, we recommend choosing the annual plan or contacting us to discuss flexible options.
pricing.faqQ8: Q8: Can I upgrade or downgrade my plan?
pricing.faqA8: Yes. You can upgrade to a higher-tier plan at any time. For downgrades, please notify us 7 days before the current period ends, and it will take effect in the next period.
